title: Redheads Tasting Room and Cafe
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Manufacturer of retail products has a tasting room where you may try their products, including vegan choices. Has vegan and gluten free sauces, hummus, balsamic vinaigrette, maple granola and salt-your-sweet mix. Enjoy the cozy, eclectic and retro setting, surrounded by art featuring local artists, free Wi-Fi and tunes you can croon along to. Breakfast and lunch served all day, including tofu scram (ask for no cheese), marinated tofu sandwich with carrots, greens and tomato, an array of salads, made-in-house burgers and more. Uses local farm-fresh foods when available.
